channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump announces plan to expand IVF services
item.description: The White House on Thursday announced measures aimed at expanding access to in vitro fertilization, including a new "most-favored nation" pricing deal...

item.title: Exclusive: Why the White House is convinced it's winning the shutdown
item.description: The White House's political operation is telling congressional Republicans to hold firm on the government shutdown , citing internal and external poll...

item.title: Zelensky hopes for Trump decision on Tomahawks tomorrow, his top aide tells Axios
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky hopes his meeting with President Trump at the White House on Friday will lead to clear decisions from the U.S. ...

item.title: Trump says he and Putin will hold second summit on Ukraine in Budapest
item.description: President Trump announced following a call with Vladimir Putin on Thursday that he and the Russian leader had agreed to meet in Hungary in the coming ...

item.title: Candlelight, big checks and a corporate-backed ballroom: Ethics experts warn of Trump project
item.description: President Trump's gold-tinted dinner Wednesday for wealthy sponsors of his planned White House ballroom served yet another example of how corporate Am...

item.title: Senate blocks military spending bill as shutdown drags on
item.description: Lawmakers aren’t much closer to ending the deadlock that has shuttered the federal government.

item.title: White House releases plan to broaden access to IVF, fertility drugs
item.description: President Donald Trump announced guidance encouraging employers to offer fertility benefits and a plan to cut the cost of fertility drugs.

item.title: Trump, buoyed by Gaza deal, plans Putin summit on Ukraine peace
item.description: Trump is seeking another diplomatic breakthrough days after brokering a ceasefire deal between Israel and Hamas.

item.title: Illinois Gov. Pritzker reports $1.4 million in Las Vegas gambling winnings
item.description: “I like to play cards,” said Pritzker, a billionaire who is often touted as a potential 2028 Democratic presidential candidate, a prospect he has not ...

item.title: Appeals court won’t let Trump deploy National Guard in Illinois for now
item.description: A federal judge had said Trump could not deploy troops in Illinois.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
